::Scyther::

Scyther chuckles. He knew he had very little rivals in spying and 
disguises, but he didn't mind praise. He walks over to a seat, sits 
down, and straps himself in.

"I'm all set. Ready when you are," he says over the comm to Chamaleon.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
wrote:
> ::Chamaleon::
> 
> "WOA!!!" said the bot "You name should have been Chameleon, because 
> you can mimic the... but if you have time, when you come back, I'll 
> show you why my name is Chameleon... beyond my beast mode.."
> 
> The bot typed the commands and takeoff process began...
> "Are you ready??" asked the thin bot.
